items.name: Winning a Nobel Prize
Superyacht ownership
Private jet ownership
Going on a private spaceflight mission
Having a university building or museum wing named after you
Founding a startup that becomes a 'unicorn' ($1B+ valuation)
Owning a blue-chip art collection (e.g., Picasso, Rothko)
Having a dedicated family office to manage assets
Receiving a personal invitation to and attending the Met Gala
Owning a Patek Philippe Grand Complications watch
Membership in an elite, invitation-only club (e.g., Augusta National)
Owning a penthouse apartment in a global capital (NYC, London, HK)
Delivering a main-stage TED Talk
Graduating from Harvard, Oxford, or an equivalent elite university
Owning a producing vineyard in a premier region (e.g., Napa, Bordeaux)
Driving a bespoke Rolls-Royce Phantom
Employing a full-time personal chef
Possessing an American Express Centurion Card ('Black Card')
Sitting front row at a major Fashion Week show (e.g., Chanel)
Flying in a long-haul First Class suite (e.g., Etihad's 'The Residence')
Publishing a critically acclaimed, international bestselling novel
Owning an Herm√®s Birkin or Kelly bag
Maintaining a staffed vacation villa in a prime location (e.g., St. Barts)
Going on a bespoke African safari with a private guide and charter flights
Collecting and cellaring rare, investment-grade wine
